Wisdom *__18.3__A harmless sun: : A light that should not hurt or molest them; but that should be an agreeable guest to them.
Wisdom *__18.9__Of good men: : Viz., of the patriarchs. Their children, the Israelites, offered in private the sacrifice of the paschal lamb; and were regulating what they were to do in their journey, when that last and most dreadful plague was coming upon their enemies.
